resources.string:
The main activity. This is where the user can see info about the track playing. Track title will be displayed along with artist and album art. 

 MediaPlayer and AudioManager classes shall be imported to handle playing sound and managing audio sources and audio output. 

 Volume is handled by hardware keys using setVolumeControlStream(). 

 A SeekBar shall be used to keep track of position in song.
This screen provides the user some information about the artist they have selected or are listening to through an api
User can view the current playlist, choose to save the playlist, or choose from previously saved playlists.

This screen contains the user's music library stored locally on the phone or from a cloud. User can sort music by artists, albums, songs, or genres. A SearchView will be used to implement a searchable configuration. 

 Songs/albums can be added to a playlist, replace the current playlist and/or play immediately. 

 Information about a selected artist can be viewed from here as well.
